## Data sources

### Fishing effort

We use satellite-based individual vessel monitoring AIS data processed by Global Fishing Watch (@kroodsma2018tracking). We use the V3 pipeline table `pipe_ais_v3_published.messages`.

### Vessel info

Vessel characteristics data processed are by Global Fishing Watch (@park2023tracking). We use the V3 pipeline table `pipe_ais_v3_published.vi_ssvid_v20240601`.
